CustomField.formula: IF ( Account.Site_Invoice_Name__c <> "", Account.Site_Invoice_Name__c,Account.Name)&BR()& IF ( Account.ShippingStreet <> "", Account.ShippingStreet&BR(), "") & IF ( Account.ShippingCity <> "", Account.ShippingCity&BR(), "") & IF ( Account.ShippingState&BR() <> "", Account.ShippingState& BR(), "") & Account.ShippingPostalCode
